question.instructions: What is the given output of this program? (5 decimal places)

answer.description: This answer has not performed the basic operations correctly. Review the order of operations
It is important that you know the difference between a float and an integer. This is the answer you would have got if you misread the first variable declaration as an integer instead of a float.
Make sure you understand the various different operators. / + - * and % all have very different meanings.
